alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 22 at 2:15PM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Powder River and Granite Passes could become closed. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to whiteout conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Backcountry enthusiasts, including snowmobilers, can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
